analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol:
	Contract CCLToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#144-145)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TokenSale.releaseTokensTo (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#340-360) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(wallet,buyer,amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#356)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#62-64) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of TokenSale. (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#329-330) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet' of TokenSale. (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#330) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_startTime' of TokenSale. (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#330-331) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_endTime' of TokenSale. (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#331) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_price' of TokenSale. (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#331) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_totalTokens' of TokenSale. (/unique_chucks/16/0x67981cfec8acae7e57d82e50fd40d20e801b325a.sol#331-333) is not in mixedCase
